ISSUE.TITLE: .gitignore exclude patterns are ignored
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Consider the following .gitignore file: ``` public/js/*.js !public/js/foo.js ``` This should match all files except for `foo.js`, and with Git it does. However, `now` does not upload any files from `public/js` including `foo.js`.
